translation.en: You must all know by now that they were recovered from a chamber in the middle of a ship…
translation.es: Como ya saben, estaban en una cámara en el barco.

translation.en: a burial ship, engineered from oak.
translation.es: Era un barco funerario. De roble.

translation.en: In my opinion, the greatest and most beautiful treasure of all.
translation.es: Para mí, ese es el tesoro más importante y hermoso.

translation.en: Ninety feet long, lying east to west.
translation.es: Tiene una eslora de 27 metros y se ubica de este a oeste.

translation.en: Found and excavated by Mr. Basil Brown.
translation.es: El Sr. Basil Brown lo halló y lo excavó.

translation.en: - To Basil! - Mr. Brown!
I'm terribly sorry.
I thought you'd be pleased with the verdict.
translation.es: Pensé que le alegraría… el veredicto.

translation.en: We die.
We die and we decay.
We don't live on.
I'm not sure I agree.
From the first human handprint on a cave wall…
translation.es: Desde las primeras impresiones de manos en las cuevas,

translation.en: we're part of something continuous.
So, we… don't really die.
- - Rory put these out this morning.
It completely slipped my mind.
Sit down.
I'm sure work like yours is very sustaining…
but it's not enough.
Life is very fleeting.
I've learnt that.
It has moments you should seize.
It could not be a better result, Mrs. Pretty.
The whole of Suffolk has been on your side.
translation.es: - Todo Suffolk la ha apoyado. - Sí.

translation.en: - Yes. - I saw you in her car.
translation.es: - Todo Suffolk la ha apoyado. - Sí. Lo vi en su auto.

translation.en: Did she mention her intentions?
- About the tea? - About the treasure, man.
translation.es: ¿Con la cena? Con el tesoro. ¿Qué planea hacer?

translation.en: - Oh. - Yes, what's she planning?
We hope that you'll agree that the Ipswich Museum is the perfect place for--
translation.es: Esperamos que crea que el Museo de Ipswich es ideal.

translation.en: - Can we talk another time? Excuse me. - Yes, absolutely. Absolutely. Yes.
translation.es: - Hablemos después. Con permiso. - Por supuesto.

translation.en: She trusts you, man.
Don't let her give it to Ipswich. The British Museum would buy everything.
translation.es: No deje que se lo dé a Ipswich. El Museo Británico compraría todo.

translation.en: It's priceless, of course, but she'll have to be reasonable.
translation.es: Su valor es inestimable, pero tendrá que ser razonable.

translation.en: Are you asking me to plead your case?
translation.es: ¿Me pide que interceda en su favor?

translation.en: Have some lemon drizzle cake, Mr. Phillips. It is most refreshing.
translation.es: Tome una rebanada de pastel de limón. Es refrescante.

translation.en: Thank you so much for what you said. I could have cheered.
translation.es: Gracias por sus palabras. Me alegraron mucho.

translation.en: My son has formed a strong attachment.
Basil's very fond of him, too.
Perhaps you might let him visit you from time to time.
translation.es: Deje que lo visite de vez en cuando.

translation.en: Of course. We'd be glad to.
C.W.'s suggesting we make a move to the ball.
translation.es: C. W. sugiere que vayamos al baile.

translation.en: Hmm. Well, I think that you should go on…
…uh, without me.
So, will… will you follow us?
I…
I don't think so.
We both have our own paths to, um, follow, don't we?
And I've seen you when you're happy.
You're rather beautiful.
- I'm happy with you. -
- I could… I could learn to be. -
I think that would be an awful shame.
Stuart! Shall we wait?
Let's… Let's go. Come on.
Go on.
Go on.
That site, it needs to be made safe for the future,
translation.es: la excavación debe ser segura para el futuro,

translation.en: so it… it don't further decay. So…
translation.es: la excavación debe ser segura para el futuro, para que no se dañe más.

translation.en: that's another week's work.
You say your goodbyes to the old girl.
Do you take care of her.
You… You don't want to stay the night?
I'll see you next week.
I'll line the hull with hessian…
and cover that with a… a layer of branches…
translation.es: y pondré una capa de ramas…

translation.en: to protect it from the weight of the earth.
translation.es: para protegerlo del peso de la tierra.

translation.en: All this soil's got to go back in.
translation.es: Debemos volver a echar la tierra.

translation.en: Leave it as we found it.
I'm giving the treasure to the British Museum.
translation.es: Le daré el tesoro al Museo Británico.

translation.en: As a gift.
It should be where the greatest number of people can freely see it.
translation.es: Debe estar donde lo vea la mayor cantidad de gente.

translation.en: I haven't told them yet.
I wanted to tell you.
Well, that's a… That's a hell of a big gift.
I don't know anyone's ever made a gift as big as that.
translation.es: Nadie habrá hecho nunca una donación de ese tamaño.

translation.en: Apparently, they haven't.
I also told Mr. Phillips that I expect your work to receive proper recognition.
translation.es: Le dije al Sr. Phillips que deben reconocer su trabajo.

translation.en: Thank you.
- Steer it steady, Mr. Brown. - Aye, aye.
translation.es: Gírelo con cuidado, Sr Brown. Bueno.

translation.en: We're coming towards the edge of the atmosphere.
translation.es: Nos acercamos al límite de la atmósfera.

translation.en: Can you see it, Mother?
We're sailing into the cosmos.
Yes, I can. Where are we heading?
Orion's Belt, to take the Queen home.
translation.es: Al Cinturón de Orión, a llevar a la reina a casa.

translation.en: Which Queen?
This boat's hers. Her people gave her treasure for her home voyage.
translation.es: La dueña del barco. Su pueblo le dio el tesoro para el viaje.

translation.en: And she was sad when the ship came…
translation.es: Estaba triste cuando llegó el barco…

translation.en: because she knew she'd be leaving everyone behind.
translation.es: porque sabía que dejaría atrás a todos.

translation.en: And she was worried
that they wouldn't get on very well without her…
translation.es: que no siguieran adelante sin ella.

translation.en: but she knew she had to follow the King into the sky.
translation.es: Sabía que debía seguir al rey al cielo.

translation.en: And so, she set off…
through the Earth and up into the cosmos.
translation.es: de la Tierra hacia el cosmos.

translation.en: - Space is a funny thing. -
Time operates quite differently up there, and 500 years can pass in a flash.
translation.es: El tiempo es diferente allá, y 500 años pasan volando.

translation.en: And the Queen looked back down to Earth.
translation.es: Y la reina miró hacia la Tierra.

translation.en: She could see that her son had grown up and that he was now a space pilot.
translation.es: Vio que su hijo había crecido y era piloto espacial.

translation.en: And she knew that when he made his first journey up to the stars,
translation.es: Sabía que cuando él hiciera su primer viaje a las estrellas,

translation.en: she would be there to meet him.
This morning, the British ambassador
translation.es: Esta mañana, el embajador británico en Berlín

translation.en: in Berlin handed the German government a final note…
translation.es: Esta mañana, el embajador británico en Berlín le dio un ultimátum al gobierno alemán…

translation.en: stating that, unless we heard from them by 11 o'clock,
translation.es: en el que se indica que si a las 11:00

translation.en: that they were prepared at once to withdraw their troops from Poland,
translation.es: no se ha confirmado su plan de retirar las tropas de Polonia,

translation.en: a state of war would exist between us.
I have to tell you now that no such undertaking has been received,
translation.es: Debo decirles que no hemos recibido dicha confirmación,

translation.en: and that, consequently, this country is at war with Germany.
translation.es: y, por consiguiente, el país está en guerra con Alemania.

translation.en: - Good night, sir. - Good night to you.
You can imagine what a bitter blow it is to me
translation.es: Se imaginarán el duro golpe que es para mí que mis esfuerzos por la paz fallaran.

translation.en: that all my long struggle to win peace has failed.
translation.es: el duro golpe que es para mí que mis esfuerzos por la paz fallaran.

translation.en: - Good night to you. - Good night.
The government have made plans
under which it will be possible to carry on the work of the nation
translation.es: en los que será posible que la nación siga adelante

translation.en: in the days of stress and strain that may be ahead…
translation.es: en los días de estrés y tensión que se avecinan…

translation.en: …but these plans need your help.
translation.es: pero estos planes necesitan su ayuda.

translation.en: You may be taking your part in the fighting services
translation.es: Pueden ser parte de las Fuerzas Armadas

translation.en: or as a volunteer.
If so, you will report for duty
translation.es: Si es así, repórtense a sus deberes

translation.en: in accordance with the instructions you receive.
It is of vital importance that you should carry on with your jobs.
translation.es: Es de vital importancia que continúen desempeñando su trabajo.

translation.en: Now, may God bless you all.
